articles.title: Sony’s legal battle against Tencent’s Horizon ‘clone’ is already over - The Verge
articles.description: Sony has reached a settlement with Tencent in its lawsuit over Light of Motiram, a game Sony alleged was a “clone” of its Horizon series.

articles.title: LG's First Dolby FlexConnect Soundbar Lets You Place Speakers Anywhere - CNET
